type.name: org.gradle.api.file.FileVisitor
type.description:
*

A {@code FileVisitor} is used to visit each of the files in a {@link FileTree}.

method.name: visitDir
method.description: * Visits a directory. * * @param dirDetails Meta-info about the directory.

method.name: visitFile
method.description: * Visits a file. * * @param fileDetails Meta-info about the file.
